item.title: CVE-2023-38512|2023-07-27T13:26:05.166Z -- wpstream -- wpstream%20%E2%80%93%20live%20streaming%2C%20video%20on%20demand%2C%20pay%20per%20view
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Wpstream WpStream – Live Streaming, Video on Demand, Pay Per View plugin <= 4.5.4 versions.
